name: Teria
description: Teria: an action quest 3D game for science fiction fans. However, on June 17, 2143, the crisis center of the Central Astronautics Agency picked up a distress signal from small planet Teria, which was then forwarded to Alex. Alex is a private detective who at that time happened to be not far from Teria.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 или AMD FX-8120 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1 Gb or AMD  HD 6850 1 Gb Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 или AMD FX-8300 + Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 2 Gb or AMD  HD 6850 2 Gb Storage: 2 GB available space
